is from Neutronized, the game is theirs, since they do have more content about Super Cat Tales I'm really upset 😡😡😡😠😠😠😤😤😤😠😡😡😡😡😠😡😡😡

Hey Developers, 

I just wanted to say that I found a bug in you’re game. Basically whenever I’m trying to play as golden cat or start a level an ad will pop up. That’s sort of where the problem starts. There’s no way to get out of the ad. Sometimes there’s an add that has an endless loop to it, I tried everything I could just so I could keep playing, and still nothing! If you could please fix this error that would be fantastic! I was about to rate this game 5 stars but I decided to rate it 4 because of the bug. Anyways, that’s all I have to say.

Thanks for listening!

title.label: No games have ever reached 5 stars by me!

content.label: Let’s start with the positives; I LOVE IT! My fave cat is Kuro the miner cat, because THE LITTLE DANG CONSTRUCTION HELMET! Also, he’s a black cat, my fave type. It’s extremely fun and challenging. No doubt the hardest game I have ever played. That’s what makes it good! The helpers are pretty adorable too. The only problem though is the ads. Once I ran out of lives, and the game offered me a restock of lives if I watched an ad. So I did. The ad was finished, and it started to repeat, so I tried to find the x, but it was NOWHERE! The ad repeated 5 times, and no x showed up. I clicked on the ad accidentally, and it transported me to the App Store. When I left, I thought it would be over. It froze. I was so dang mad. Please fix that. But anyway you put it, this is, no doubt, my favorite game on IOS!
Why can’t I get out of the adds😡😡😡 and make the adds more appropriate!!but...........I LOVE IT!!!
I love this game but when ever it asks me if I want to be golden cat and I say yes it just does nothing or puts me in a video loop.

title.label: Good but Ads broke game and had to restart iPad twice

content.label:
The game overall is great. I really liked the game,but when I watch an ad to get a new helper

It kept looping and looping and looping and never stopped.
I also clicked the golden cat ad but then game froze

Overall status: Really good tbh!!!!

I like the game a good amount. The graphics are good, the characters cute, and the puzzles a perfect amount of challenging. 

However, this game is not without its faults. Whenever you try to watch a video, there’s no button to leave the add, so it repeats over and over, until you leave the app. Once you do, you don’t even get what you were promised, so it defeats the entire point of watching the adds. 

Puzzles can also be unfairly difficult, as sometimes the way you are supposed to go is located off screen, so you aren’t able to find the correct way until you play it several times. 

Overall, I enjoy the game, and intend to get the second after I finish this one.

I love the game, it’s so cute and adventurous. I wanna play more but the screen is cut off on the bottom and right, so I can’t see the whole screen. I’m assuming the app doesn’t support iPhone 11 devices. please fix! I can’t wait to see the whole screen!
